services.Service: Determination of Fruit Seedling Source Center
Required Documents: Recommendation letter from the concerned local body
Application from the nursery owner with a record of quality seedlings in the nursery
services.Time Taken: For winter fruits, by Kartik 15; for summer fruits, by Chaitra end, to be submitted to the center with recommendation from the local level.

services.Service: Annual collection of fruit seedling demand and management for supply
Required Documents: Official letter regarding annual target and demand from province/local body and farm/center, and record of quality seedlings from private nurseries
services.Time Taken: For winter fruits, by the end of Kartik; for summer fruits, by Baisakh 15, the center must prepare the balance sheet and complete correspondence.

services.Service: Technical service delivery for fruit nursery and special cultivation
Oral or written official letter from individual/institution
Required Documents: Oral or written official letter from individual/institution
services.Time Taken: Updated annually and provided as per demand

services.Service: Management and distribution of fruit-related technology publications
Required Documents: Oral or written official request letter from individual/institution
services.Time Taken: Prepared annually/quarterly and provided immediately as per demand

services.Service: Provision of technical information and problem solving related to fruits
Required Documents: Oral or written official request letter from individual/institution
services.Time Taken: Service provided as soon as demand is received

services.Service: Coordination and partnership/collaboration with various agencies for fruit development and extension
Processing and facilitation of budget and program-related applications
services.Time Taken: Service provided as soon as demand is received

Required Documents: Information on approved programs and written letter for grievance
services.Time Taken: Within 3 days of submission of grievance, as per need and rules, as soon as possible

Required Documents: As per Civil Service Act and Rules
services.Time Taken: Service provided as soon as demand is received

services.Service: Distribution of annual progress reports and booklets published by the center
Required Documents: Oral or written official request letter from individual/institution
services.Time Taken: Service provided as soon as demand is received

Required Documents: Application, approved order, bill payment, decision, and other necessary supporting documents
services.Time Taken: Within 3 days of submission of required documents
